block_comment: This block of code is a synchronous reset mechanism for the reception validity flags "RxValid_d" and "RxValid". On the positive edge of the MRxClk clock signal or the active Reset, the conditional statements are evaluated. When "Reset" is high, both "RxValid_d" and "RxValid" are asynchronously set to 0, effectively invalidating them. If "Reset" is low, "RxValid_d" and "RxValid" take on the value of "GenerateRxValid" and "RxValid_d" respectively, acting as delay elements for each clock cycle.
